definition[0]: very detailed work that has been done using a lot of skill, so that the result is beautiful
example[0]: The carving is a superb piece of craftsmanship.
definition[1]: the special skill that someone uses to make something beautiful with their hands
definition[2]: the special skill someone uses to make something beautiful with their hands
example[2]: They make world-class cars with craftsmanship.
definition[3]: the quality that something has when it is made with a lot of skill or made by a craftsman or craftswoman
example[3]: The attention to detail seen in this furniture is evidence of the superb craftsmanship.
